title: Language Filter
body:
Does anyone know of another chat filter setting besides the one on the main menu settings. I've turned that chat filter off, which lets me unfilter chats before game starts. but once I am in queue my chat becomes filtered in queue as well as in game. But in queue, if I were to pm someone, it is not filtered.

help?

replies.body:
You can toggle the filter in-game through a chat command:   /chatfilter 

http://i.imgur.com/K92fiCb.png

Let me know if that does the trick!
You are a genius. thank you!
